column1: Happy Thanksgiving from our family to yours. - The Cloud Family #HappyThanksgiving https://t.co/vfwTSVSTFe
Yesterday I appeared on the Bob Jones show to talk about the post election situation and our upcoming work in Washington.   Tune in here: https://t.co/3Caw2XpoMT
Read my full statement concerning the questions I have asked AG Barr and our electoral process here.   https://t.co/cU1oBR8BbD
Appeared on the Wade & Carter show this morning to talk about the current election situation and voter integrity.   Starts at 35:30.  https://t.co/Aa4Brj6VuV
My statement backing up President @realDonaldTrump’s concern for transparency and integrity at every level. https://t.co/kitS4kzCZG

THANK YOU!!  Thank you so much for the honor of continuing to serve you in Congress.  Because of you and your support we won with 63% of the vote and we kept Texas Texas! #TX27   My full statement here:  https://t.co/T5g65XVbzd https://t.co/vst6s1uAQf
We have been declared the winner for District 27 with 62.4 percent reporting. Thank you!  https://t.co/x8PoivcEyg https://t.co/sxJVD9FGR2
Two and a half more hours to get to the polls. They close at 7 pm.   Find your polling places here: https://t.co/s38T0TdLhQ  Then join us for our Election night party. https://t.co/2lMKJPnpJK

Thankful for good friends all over this district who work to preserve liberty.   Let’s get out the vote.  Find your polling place here and get there BEFORE 7 pm. https://t.co/s38T0TdLhQ  #VOTE #WhartonCounty #VictoriaCounty https://t.co/N43Z36muQh
Go Vote! It is Election Day!  Find your polling places here: https://t.co/s38T0TdLhQ https://t.co/gAOpiJRzIG
First stop of the day - Lavaca County.   Thank you all for your support. Let’s get all of our family and friends to the polls. #vote2020 #ElectionDay #LavacaCounty https://t.co/lycZpoTKjH
Today is the DAY! Thank you for your support and your VOTE!  #vote #2020Elections #ElectionDay #VOTECLOUD #TX27 https://t.co/7IEuUQTFhT

What an honor to represent the 27th District of Texas & to see so many on fire patriots rallying today with Senator @JohnCornyn & Senator @tedcruz in Corpus Christi and Victoria.   Tomorrow is the day!   Let’s make it count & get every voter to the polls to defend the USA. https://t.co/GLghFuCB0q
Join us tonight for prayer for TEXAS and AMERICA! https://t.co/lmFIW9Ezkn

Join us on Election Night!   https://t.co/lSBPQlg0RW https://t.co/7m7QrTtC23

Today is the last day of early voting. 7 am to 7 pm. Thank you for your vote! Let's get all of our family and friends out. Choose your America.   Find your polling places here: https://t.co/fHmOr3OyfU https://t.co/jb3sEg8O34

It is an honor to stand up for our families our communities and our Texas values. Thankful for the endorsement of @TxValuesAction.   Last day of early voting today. Find your location here: https://t.co/NcjjrqQcpm https://t.co/6z2qANdBZ5
Fun afternoon meeting voters in Jackson County. Tomorrow is the last day of early voting. Don’t forget to let your voice be heard. https://t.co/KMzo02jajX

It is an important part of my job and one I take very seriously to stand up for the United States taxpayers and our families.   Proud to have the endorsement of the @ACUConservative with a 100% voting record. https://t.co/WXdzVFQCuB
Join us on the night before the Election as we pray around Texas for our nation. https://t.co/QXiql5DW0G

What a historic day as President Trump’s third nominated Justice on the Supreme Court is confirmed by the Senate & sworn in. Amy Coney Barrett - a wife a mother of seven and a great legal mind with unmatched qualifications - is an incredible addition to our highest court. #ACB
Thank you @ACUConservative! https://t.co/c7soIqjDDI

This is the last week to vote early in Texas! Early voting locations are open Monday through Friday across the 27th Congressional District. This is the moment when the voice of “we the people” is heard. Don’t forget to vote! https://t.co/zDAl3QZQAC
Today I VOTED and I wanted to remind you to do the same! #election2020 https://t.co/FjIbtctlUr

A foundational moral principle in our nation is the understanding that every life has value. Our rights - beginning with the right to life - are not a grant of government but rather a gift from God. Thank you for your vote as we support LIFE. #prolife https://t.co/eRAaZRLtki

This last weekend we took a group of volunteers to North San Antonio to knock doors and talk to voters for my friend Congressman @chiproytx who is running an important race against Wendy Davis. As Texans and conservatives we have to stand together. Let’s keep Texas Texas! https://t.co/bDgTPelUwi

Today I stand side by side with my friends in Travis County for our law enforcement as we STAND UP and back the BLUE. Congressman @chiproytx and Congressman @RogerWilliamsTX need to be sent back to Washington DC. Vote Republican. #BacktheBlue #VOTEGOP #LeadRight https://t.co/AWOvevXkzR
So glad our team can help my friend @chiproytx this weekend. Let’s go win! #TX21 https://t.co/z0K7UxF8Ft
@chiproytx So glad our team can help! Let’s go win!
Thank you for voting. Early voting begins today. Let's get out the VOTE.   All of the details by county are here: https://t.co/fHmOr3OyfU https://t.co/L3PCAuWdeP

Today is the first day of Early Voting! I need your help to keep fighting to restore safety and security to our streets and neighborhoods and to keep rebuilding our Texas economy. I would be honored to have your vote. #txlege #Election2020 #texasvote #TexasEarlyVoting #voteCloud https://t.co/tLWfHJ4urs

TOMORROW it begins! I’d be honored to have your vote as you head to the polls. Here are all of the early voting locations and times by county. Let's get out the VOTE!   https://t.co/fHmOr3OyfU https://t.co/egvltem4m9

What a great morning with friends and my family in Victoria talking to voters about the importance of voting. This is an important election for all of our communities. I would be honored to have your vote.   #victoria #TX27 #VOTE https://t.co/uDLTZ0Bb6i

Please pause with us right now as we pray for our President our First Lady & everyone else at the White House affected by COVID-19. Last Saturday I was invited to pray on behalf of Congress. May God's grace be with you and your family as we pray today. https://t.co/Ooy88Hhsx4
At The Return about to pray. https://t.co/A3qqJzx3Ap
Join us today as we seek the Lord for America from Washington DC. You can stream it at https://t.co/Bq4ul591Ks https://t.co/QE1IBt0q90

Protecting the right of those yet to be born continues to be a top priority for me. No American should have their hard earned tax dollars going to pay for an abortion against their will.  Proud to have an A rating from @SBAList for protecting LIFE. #Prolife https://t.co/6ZspI53SWr

Today is National Voter Registration Day! Make sure you register today if you haven’t already.   Deadline is October 5th. https://t.co/qadovTDKRn  #VoteCloud #VoteGOP #NationalVoterRegistrationDay https://t.co/BhF7PjzHPM

Today as we celebrate with the Jewish people the sweetness of their New Year - let us all look with hope and expectation to the weeks and months ahead. Our best days are ahead of us! #roshhashana #JewishNewYear https://t.co/v1JLMyZEkS

Today we honor the contributions of the American worker. Today just like other times in our history - it is so important that we get the American people back to work. Work is freedom's way to bring strength prosperity & well-being to our families and communities. #HappyLaborDay https://t.co/qOI3sQyIkp

The Committee For a Responsible Federal Budget @BudgetHawks works through @FixtheDebt to educate the public on our nation's fiscal situation confronting our debt challenges & celebrating budget policy leaders. I am honored to be one of their 2020 Fiscal Heroes. https://t.co/RK3uUtzwZF

We have a President and a Vice President that loves America - that believes in the greatness of all our people. Together - we cling to the words of the Declaration of Independence "that they are endowed by their Creator with certain unalienable Rights...” #RNC2020 #TrumpPence2020 https://t.co/Lt8euzMFaD

In this unprecedented time - we see heroes all around us - doctors nurses police officers sheriffs emergency professionals our military national guard members small business owners teachers and parents that are fighting to keep America strong.  #RNC2020 #WeThePeople https://t.co/jNvEPY5Oe2

America is a land of opportunity where we always believe & work for more prosperity for our children and grandchildren. We must together vote & engage to "keep this republic" alive and free.    This November we have a choice - what kind of America will we choose?   #RNC2020 https://t.co/NyWsQQegVe

In this experiment in self-government we call America we find a land of PROMISE - one that strives to guarantee equal opportunity to all Americans & has done more to provide freedom prosperity & social uplift to more people than any other force in human history.   #RNC2020 #GOP https://t.co/EiUyRWgJE8

ENDORSEMENT ALERT: Texans are leaders in agriculture and our heritage in farming here in South Texas is diverse and an important industry for our entire state’s families.   Honored to have the support of the Texas Farm Bureau for my re-election to serve as your Congressman. https://t.co/BbSZRYdKmc

Last week I had a chance to talk with Bob Jones on radio - discussing China’s malicious intent towards the United States another COVID stimulus bill and other important issues facing us here in South Texas.   https://t.co/VBh2OtKFW0
Reminder to check out our campaign video for 2020. Please share it with others. We need to keep Texas Texas. https://t.co/Xh7fwUztYD

I appeared on Fox & Friends First to talk about the need for more healthcare personnel in S. TX in the midst of COVID-19 my letter for more help via the U.S. Navy & my thoughts on accountability for the money that we have already allocated to be spent. https://t.co/NK24q6MmOX

Hanging out today with our party activists & my beautiful wife as we are both delegates for our @TexasGOP state convention. Also participating with the Congressional virtual “lunch” with many of my colleagues. We are strong. We will get this done for Texas and keep Texas Texas. https://t.co/EisDWXXORb

2 years ago I had the honor of being sworn into the House of Representatives on an open Bible turned to Proverbs 14:34 "Righteousness exalts a nation." As I took an oath to defend the Constitution surrounded by my family I was in awe of what our campaign together accomplished. https://t.co/XOtgpBGCK0
May we always remember that freedom is never free and we have to pass our principles to the next generations to come. Happy Fourth of July! God Bless America! https://t.co/odlo2T2GjD
We must HOLD Texas in 2020. Please help us before midnight tonight with a gift of $5?   https://t.co/okiFflt96Q https://t.co/ItOCPOgsH2
As we look toward the fall - we all need to know what is at stake. It is critical that we HOLD TEXAS. Watch our campaign video about the importance of Texas in 2020.   https://t.co/CbpnPL1OhT

What a historic day as l watched the launch of the first manned US mission to space from US soil in nearly a decade with President Trump & Vice President Pence in attendance.  As a young boy I remember being inspired by the space program. Congrats @NASA & @SpaceX.  #launchamerica https://t.co/OZTxoaGj0l
